import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Grid, Cell } from "react-mdl"; import FadeIn from 'react-fade-in'; import Typewriter from "typewriter-effect"; import ProfilePic from "./images/profile.png"; class LandingPage extends Component { render() { return (

{ typewriter .typeString("Max Clayton") .pauseFor(4000) .deleteAll() .typeString("Web De") .typeString("velopment") .pauseFor(2000) .deleteChars(9) .typeString("sign") .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString("Mobile Development") .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString("UX/UI") .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString("Max Clayton") .start(); }} />
